title: Control of Eating Behavior Using a Novel Feedback System
procedures:
All work on experimental subjects and patients has been approved by the Central Ethical Review Board of Stockholm, Sweden.
1. Control of Eating Rate and Food Intake by Visual Feedback
Download the device application.
Turn on the scale by pressing the red button on the bottom of the scale (Figure 1).
Open the application and select a meal by pressing Control to eat without visual feedback or by pressing Training to eat with visual feedback (Figure 2).
Connect the scale to the smartphone by selecting one of the scales found and pressing CONNECT (Figure 3).
Place a plate on the scale. Press Done to continue (Figure 4).
Put food on the plate (0%).
	
Put more food on the plate (72%).
Press Start when ready to eat (100%) (Figure 5).
Adapt rate of eating to the dashed blue reference curve (Figure 6).
Rate feeling of fullness when the rating scale appears on the screen. Adapt rating of fullness to the s-shaped dashed purple reference curve. Press Done to continue eating (Figure 7).
Slow down if eating too quickly (Figure 8).
With no food left on plate, press No when finished eating (Figure 9).
As the meal duration is shown when meal is finished, press Done to exit (Figure 10).
